CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Drone Pilots relative to Freight Train?
SRP.A: Drone Pilots is {above} Freight Train in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Night Shift relative to International Routes?
SRP.A: Night Shift is {above} International Routes in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Long-Haul Operators relative to Night Shift?
SRP.A: Long-Haul Operators is {above} Night Shift in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total driver satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Drone Pilots}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total driver satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Hazardous Material}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Long-Haul Operators's minimum Driver Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Long-Haul Operators's minimum Driver Satisfaction is in {1971}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Last-Mile Couriers's maximum Driver Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Last-Mile Couriers's maximum Driver Satisfaction is in {1975}.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1969, did the total Driver Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1975 and 1976?
NC.A: The change in total driver satisfaction between 1959 and 1969 was {larger} than between 1975 and 1976.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1969, was the average total Driver Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1966 and 1974?
NC.A: The average total driver satisfaction between 1960 and 1969 was {lower} than between 1966 and 1974.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1974, was the average total Driver Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1972 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total driver satisfaction between 1965 and 1974 was {lower} than between 1972 and 1975.

NC.Q: Was the total Driver Satisfaction in 1960 higher or lower than in 1972?
NC.A: The total driver satisfaction in 1960 was {lower} than in 1972.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Drone Pilots} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Long-Haul Operators and Drone Pilots first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Long-Haul Operators and Drone Pilots did not exchange leading positions.
